subject: CE & RoHS certificate Simsonn Pro Plus or Plus X
description_text:
Hello. I need CE & RoHS certificate Simsonn Pro Plus or Plus X

Please send me.

This url not works: https://download.simsonn.com/manual

Thanks.

conversations.body_text: Hi David Santana,    These are Plus X certificates.

Thanks. I need RoHS too, it's possible?

El mar, 24 jun 2025, 12:25, service@simsonn.com
Hi David Santana,    Sorry, we don't have RoHS at the moment.

This? Any Simpsons product. I need it for customs import. Thanks.

El mié, 25 jun 2025, 4:23, service@simsonn.com
Hi David Santana,     Our previous RoHS expired, the new product has not been RoHS certified, is the CE certificate is not enough to complete the customs declaration?

Unfortunately not. It doesn't matter if the previous RoHS certificate is
expired or if it's from an older product. Customs officials will probably
only look at the manufacturer and whether it has a RoHS certificate. Please
send me any RoHS certificate you have. I would greatly appreciate it.

Thank you for your time and kindness.

El mié, 25 jun 2025, 6:45, service@simsonn.com
Hi David Santana,    Is that okay?

It's perfect. Thank you so much.

Have a good day!

El mié, 25 jun 2025, 7:54, service@simsonn.com
